query:
ALTER TABLE notificationHistory 
  ADD COLUMN smsSent tinyint DEFAULT 0 AFTER emailSentAt,
  ADD COLUMN smsSentAt timestamp NULL AFTER smsSent,
  ADD COLUMN smsDeliveryStatus enum('pending','sent','delivered','failed','undelivered') NULL AFTER smsSentAt,
  ADD COLUMN smsMessageId varchar(255) NULL AFTER smsDeliveryStatus
